data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core LIMAGNE1, Limagne, France
Marsh. Physiography: maar. Surrounding vegetation: forest and cultivated fields. Local vegetation: Sphagnum, Cyperaceae. Location: north east of Limagne village
Recherches pollenanalytiques sur l'histoire de la végétation des monts du Velay, Massif Central, France
